_sText:
This is a fully controled rocket launcher. You can aim with the mouse, shot with the left mouse button, and make the rocket explode with right mouse button. It has got 20 rockets, after launching them, it will stop shotting (You can modify the maximum rockets in the math_counter) 
If you find any bugs, please tell me. And if you use it in your map credit me.
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pQA7JxyA3Z4
